评论概述: Order a size bigger than you need
评论详情: I had to do some major tailoring so that it would fit. Very very tight around the bust. The rest of the dress fit fine but if you have some big to the larger breasts you might want to order a size or two bigger. Otherwise it's cute I used to play Lucy Ricardo and it was very cute. Kind of expensive for what I think you get but that's a different story
It’s not what I expected in fabric feel
